Table: figure

A figure appears in a report and may consist of one or more images.

figure Structure
F-Key Name Type Description
identifier character varying PRIMARY KEY

A descriptive identifier for this figure.
chapter.identifier#1 chapter_identifier character varying UNIQUE#1

The chapter in which this figure appears.
title character varying

The short title, if any.
caption character varying

The figure caption.
attributes character varying

A free form list of attributes for this figure.
time_start timestamp(3) without time zone

The start of the spatial extent represtented by this figure.
time_end timestamp(3) without time zone

The end of the spatial extent represtented by this figure.
lat_max character varying

The nothernmost latitude in the bounding box for this figure.
lat_min character varying

The southernmost latitude in the bounding box for this figure.
lon_max character varying

The eastermost longitude in the bounding box for this figure.
lon_min character varying

The westernmost longitude in the bounding box for this figure.
usage_limits character varying

Copyright restrictions describing how this figure may be used.
submission_dt timestamp(3) without time zone

The date on which this image was submitted.
create_dt timestamp(3) without time zone

The date on which this image was created.
source_citation character varying

Text describing the source of this figure.
ordinal character varying UNIQUE#1

The numeric position of this figure within a chapter. Must start with a number, may contain numbers, letters, dashes, dots and underscores
chapter.report_identifier#1 report.identifier report_identifier character varying PRIMARY KEY UNIQUE#1

The report associated with this figure
url character varying

A URL for a landing page for this figure.
_origination json

origination metadata collected by TSU, should eventually be mapped to an Activity

 

figure Constraints
Name Constraint
ck_figure_identifier CHECK (((identifier)::text ~ similar_escape('[a-z0-9_-]+'::text, NULL::text)))
figure_mostly_numeric_ordinal CHECK (((ordinal)::text ~ '^[0-9]+[0-9a-zA-Z._-]*$'::text))

Tables referencing this one via Foreign Key Constraints:

image_figure_map
